forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow this afternoon. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some lingering evening flurries or snow showers. Cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some lingering evening flurries or snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
